original_title: ពេលម៉ែចាស់ទៅ
overview: A film about the lives of two mothers and their children reflects the real life that is happening in today's society. After years of waiting, the long-awaited finale is finally over, as "When My Mother Gets Old", the third series to tell the story of a mother's life after "Mother's Heart" and "Modern Mother".
tagline: When mother gets old... The distance between mother and child is getting farther... Why?
title: When Mom Gets Old
